name: Denial and Judgment
description: An earring that you picked up in the ruins after completing the duel againstThe Knave.  The red symbol upon it resembles the image in her eyes, a declaration and arejection alike.  The orphaned live lives filled with suffering from childhood — this she seesand keeps in her heart.  As fate casts an examining eye on humanity, so too will humans cast judgmentupon fate.
